name: Small Sister
description: Small Sister is a game about a contest: "living in a house with strangers". The goal is to gain as many points as you can by interacting with other contestants and to be the winner at the end.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Pentium IV 1 Ghz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB graphics card - Geforce FX 5200 or ATI Radeon 9200 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 675 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible sound card
